project_not_found.title: Project Not Found
project_not_found.description: Sorry, the project you’re looking for doesn’t exist or may have been removed. Please check the URL or return to the Projects page to explore my other work.

page_not_found.title: Page Not Found
page_not_found.description: Oops! The page you’re looking for doesn’t exist or has been moved. Please check the URL or go back to the homepage.

general.title: Something went wrong
general.description: Oops! Something went wrong on our end. Please refresh and try again.

youtube_video.player_error: HTML5 player error. The requested content cannot be played in an HTML5 player
youtube_video.not_found: Video not found. It may have been removed or set to private
youtube_video.restricted: The video owner has restricted playback on certain sites
